H0.text: Which was the first city to host the Summer Olympics twice. London

H1.text: Which was the first city to host the Summer Olympics twice. Los Angeles

H2.text: Which was the first city to host the Summer Olympics twice. Athens

H3.text: Which was the first city to host the Summer Olympics twice. PARIS

A4.text: Paris was the first city to host the Summer Olympics twice and the second to host three times, hosting in 1900, 1924 and 2024.
